org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.sampledata.castor
Class AeCastorToAeStructure

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.sampledata.castor.AeCastorToAeStructure
public class AeCastorToAeStructure
extends java.lang.Object

Creates an AE schema tree model (AeStructure) from a Castor XML Schema ElementDecl object. The ElementDecl may be of simple or complex type.

          Stack for regulating recursion depth.

protected static java.util.List getSubstitutionGroupMembers(org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.ElementDecl aElementDecl)
